            더 보기
            We’re looking for an experienced Accountant to oversee general accounting operations by controlling and verifying our financial transactions.The accountant’s responsibilities include reconciling account balances and bank statements, maintaining general ledger and preparing month-end close procedures. We want our accountant to have excellent analytical skills with a thorough knowledge of accounting principles to analyze financial reports and forecasts and also experience collaborating with other teams.As the Accountant at Viana, you will- Verity, allocate, post and reconcile accounts payable and receivable- Produce error-free accounting reports and present their results- Analyze financial information and summarize financial status- Spot errors and suggest ways to improve efficiency and spending- Provide technical support and advice on Management team- Review and recommend modifications to accounting systems and procedures- Participate in financial standards setting and in forecast process- Provide input into department’s goal setting process- Prepare financial statements and produce budget according to schedule- Assist with tax audits and tax returns- Direct internal and external audits to ensure compliance- Support month-end and year-end close process- Develop and document business processes and accounting policies to maintain and strengthen internal controls- Liaise with our management team to improve financial procedures- Plan, assign and review staff’s work

            And Our Ideal Accountant will have- Up to 5 years proven experience in Finance, preferably in an overseas online platform business or trading / logistics company- Thorough knowledge of basic accounting procedures- Awareness of business trends- Hands-on experience with general ledger functions and the month-end / year-end closing process- Ability to lead and influence decisions across all areas of the business- A data-driven approach to decision making, with advanced analytic, modeling, and forecasting skills- Accuracy and attention to detail and aptitude for numbers and quantitative skills- Degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or similar- Bonus points : Experience with Treasury, Corporate Development, or CPA- At least business level of English fluencyEmployment conditions- Salary / Wages : TBD within company budget- Days of the week & hours : Mon to Fri  9:00 - 18:00- Statue : Regular  (Probation : A month)How to apply- Email the application to talent@vianacare.com  - Current resume/CV in English- Current Visa Status if necessaryViana Co., Ltd는 Foreign-owned company로 다양한 국적의 동료들과 함께 근무하고 있습니다.의사전달을 원활히 하기 위해서는 영어로 소통하려는 노력이 필요합니다.재무회계, 결산(월/분기/연), 전표검수, 법인세 신고, 회계 신고, 재무제표 검토, 재무분석(결산보고)제반 회계 이슈 검토, 회계 감사 대응, 자금제도 기획 및 관리, 자금수지 관리 및 추정, 자금보고, 자금 입출금 관리
